DOC.brief_title: Treatment CIK Patients With Refractory Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: Autologous cytokine-induced killer ( CIK ) cell transfusion ( > 2*10^9 cell count ) within 2 week regular chemotherapy every 3 month .
